text:
Raskolnikov's Tense Encounter

Dimly lit room, Raskolnikov nervous, old woman suspicious.  
His heart races.  
Raskolnikov: “Why, Alyona Ivanovna, you know me… Raskolnikov.”  

Old Woman: “Why do you look so pale?”  
Raskolnikov: “Take it if you like, if not I’ll go.”  

---  

Old Woman: “What is it?”  
Raskolnikov: “The silver cigarette case; I spoke of it.”  

Old Woman: “Your hands are trembling… Fever?”  
Raskolnikov: “You can’t help getting pale… nothing to eat.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov visits Alyona Ivanovna to present a pledge but feels increasingly anxious and mistrusted during the encounter.
